GSD.product_version: versions from v4.15 to before v5.10.140
GSD.description:
scsi: storvsc: Remove WQ_MEM_RECLAIM from storvsc_error_wq

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.140 by commit 46fcb0fc884db78a0384be92cc2a51927e6581b8, it was introduced in version v4.15 by commit 436ad941335386c5fc7faa915a8fbdfe8c908084. For more details please see the references link.
